sn55.32:4.3: Idha, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti—
sn55.32:5.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako dhamme … pe …
sn55.32:6.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako vigatamalamaccherena cetasā agāraṃ ajjhāvasati muttacāgo payatapāṇi vossaggarato yācayogo dānasaṃvibhāgarato.
sn55.32:6.3: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro puññābhisandā kusalābhisandā sukhassāhārā”ti.
